text: Adcatomus is a genus of South American huntsman spiders that was first described by Ferdinand Anton Franz Karsch in 1880. it contains two species, found in Peru and Venezuela: A. ciudadus and A. flavovittatus. ==See also== * List of Sparassidae species ==References== Category:Araneomorphae genera Category:Sparassidae Category:Spiders of South America
title: Adcatomus
